name: ool
description: Doubly-supported by NeXTJS and Rust. Should just be testing GitHub REST API using various methods.

scripts.format: npm run format:app && npm run format:back
scripts.format:app: cd app && bun x biome format
scripts.affected:lint: git diff --name-only --cached | grep 'app/' | xargs bun x biome lint
scripts.format:check: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | xargs bun x biome format --write
